content.raw:
Hi Hugo
1. That's the output of /var/www-cloudsim-auth/machines:

```
#!script

michele@darpaws5:~/trio/cloudsim_c4097d37e$ ./ssh2.bash 
Warning: Permanently added '54.242.249.62' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.
Welcome to Ubuntu 12.04.1 LTS (GNU/Linux 3.2.0-29-virtual x86_64)

 * Documentation:  https://help.ubuntu.com/

  System information as of Wed Mar 13 05:14:12 UTC 2013

  System load:  0.08              Processes:           68
  Usage of /:   15.9% of 7.97GB   Users logged in:     0
  Memory usage: 37%               IP address for eth0: 10.193.39.129
  Swap usage:   0%

  => There is 1 zombie process.

  Graph this data and manage this system at https://landscape.canonical.com/

101 packages can be updated.
46 updates are security updates.

Get cloud support with Ubuntu Advantage Cloud Guest
  http://www.ubuntu.com/business/services/cloud
*** /dev/xvda1 will be checked for errors at next reboot ***

ubuntu@domU-12-31-39-0F-24-73:~$ ls -l /var/www-cloudsim-auth/machines/cxe378f80a
ls: cannot access /var/www-cloudsim-auth/machines/cxe378f80a: Permission denied
ubuntu@domU-12-31-39-0F-24-73:~$ sudo su !$
sudo su /var/www-cloudsim-auth/machines/cxe378f80a
Unknown id: /var/www-cloudsim-auth/machines/cxe378f80a

```

I have no way to ftp a file but the last lines of /tmp/cloudsimd.log are:


```

cloudsim log> ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=5 -i /var/www-cloudsim-auth/machines/cxe378f80a/key-router-cxe378f80a.pem ubuntu@107.23.122.115 ping -c3 10.0.0.52
```
